title: Tour de France stage 9: Michael Woods wins as Tadej Pogačar gains time on Jonas Vingegaard on Puy de Dome
content:
Woods caught Jorgenson in the final 500 meters after the American went on the attack with just under 50km to go.

Read the full article at Tour de France stage 9: Michael Woods wins as Tadej Pogačar gains time on Jonas Vingegaard on Puy de Dome on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
